revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: "(Column) 87:;Petheus, son of Apollonios, grandson of Petheus, mother Tasoucharion, drachmas 8;;Ptolemaios, his brother with the same mother, drachmas 8;;Kastor, son of Ptolemaios, grandson of Phaesis, mother Tapasion, drachmas 8;;Pnepheros, son of Petheus, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thaisas, copper drachmas 4;;Pnepheros, son of Pasoxis, grandson of Petesouchos, mother Thakialis, copper drachmas 4;;Mysthes, son of Harphaesis, grandson of Mysthes, mother Thermouthis, drachmas 8;;Keras, son of Nekpheraus (Patkilkai);;(in left margin: drachmas 12 obols 15) geometria of year 12 drachmas 12 obols 5.5, surcharges obols 5, in total drachmas 13 obols 4.5;;in total for the day drachmas 332.;(Epeiph) 30 likewise:;Sisois, son of Petesouchos alias Pnepheros, grandson of Sokrates, mother Tapetheus, drachmas 4 obols 28;;Sabeinos alias Petheus, son of Sokrates, grandson of Pasion, mother Thaesis, drachmas 28;;Taonnophris, daughter of Euhemeros (son of Maronas);;(in left margin: drachmas 32 obols 24) orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 5, tax on the produce of olives obols 4 chalki 2, naubion obols 3, surcharges drachma 1 obol 1.5;;eparourion drachmas 3 obols 2, surcharges obol 1.5 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1 chalki 2, in total drachmas 11 obol 1.5 chalki 2;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 12 obols 3, surcharges obols 5, in total drachmas 13 obols 2;;and Leondarous, daughter of Chairemon;;orchard taxes of year 12 obols 3.5 chalki 2, tax on the produce of olives obol 0.5 chalki 2, naubion obol 0.5, surcharges obol 1;;eparourion obols 2.5, surcharges chalki 2, kollybos chalki 2, drachma 1 obols 3;;geometria of year 12 drachma 1 obols 3.5, surcharges obol 0.5 chalki 2, drachma 1 obols 4 chalki 2;;donkey tax of year 13 for the use in year 11 paid to Gaius Julius Saturnilus;;drachmas 5, surcharges obols 2, in total drachmas 5 obols 2;;Gaius Julius Terentianus;;(in left margin: drachmas 96 obols 26) orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 11 obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives drachma 1 obols 3.5, naubion drachma 1 obol 1, surcharges drachmas 2 obols 5;;eparourion drachmas 7 obols 3, surcharges obols 4, kollybos obols 2.5, in total drachmas 25 obols 2.5;;and to Gaius Julius Arrianus;;orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 2 obols 2.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 2.5, naubion obols 2.5 chalki 2, surcharges obols 4 chalki 2;;eparourion drachma 1 obols 4.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 1, kollybos obol 0.5 chalki 2, in total drachmas 6 obols 2.5;;in Psenarpsenesis likewise:;orchard taxes of year 12 apomoira drachmas 6 obol 1.5, tax on the produce of olives obols 5.5, naubion obols 3.5 chalki 2, surcharges drachma 1 obols 3.5;;eparourion drachmas 4 obol 1, surcharges obols 2 chalki 2, kollybos obol 1.5, in total drachmas 14 obol 1;;naubion of katoikoi of year 13 obols 5, surcharges obol 1, kollybos chalki 2, in total drachma 1 chalki 2;;and Gaius Julius Terentianus;;naubion of katoikoi of year 13 obols 4.5 chalki 2, surcharges obol 0.5, kollyboschalki 2, in total obols 5.5;;and to Nekpheraus, son of Nekpheraus;;dove-cote tax of year 13 drachma 1, surcharges obol 0.5, in total drachma 1 obol 1.5;;and to Gaius Julius Terentianus;;geometria of year 12 drachmas 45, surcharges drachmas 2 obols 5, in total drachmas 47 obols 5;;Mysthes, son of Mysthes, grandson of Petsiris, mother Sambous, guard, drachmas 4;;Phanomgeus, son of Phanomgeus, grandson of Phanomgeus, mother Taptosiris, copper drachmas 4;;Chairemon, his son, mother Tbelles, copper drachmas 4

listBibl.bibl: Rep Editor - Pearl OM; Rep Ser. - Diss; 1938; pg. 9 - 10 Youtie HC, PMich IV, 1, 224, 1937 -- BL III, 113 (on l. 8 a.o) Pearl OM - Youtie HC, PMich IV, 357 C, D, 1939
